abstract: Web sites and other training resources for small-business owners.
snippet: Web sites and other training resources for small-business owners.
lead_paragraph: Details about the I.B.M. and Home Depot corporate supplier diversity programs can be found at ibm.com/procurement and corporate.homedepot.com. The Billion Dollar Roundtable, bdrusa.org, lists the 16 large companies that spent $1 billion or more each annually with suppliers owned by minorities or women.

headline.main: More Information on Training for Small Businesses
headline.print_headline: More Information on Training for Small Businesses
